\documentclass{article}
\usepackage[rounded]{syntax}
\usepackage{url}

\title{COMPSCI 3TB3/4TB3/6TB3 Assignment 2 Question 3}
\author{Ricky Fan}

\begin{document}
\maketitle

\begin{grammar}
    <expression> ::= ['+' | '-'] <term> \{('+' | '-') <term>\}
 
   <term> ::= <factor> \{('$\times$' | '/') <factor>\}
 
   <factor> ::= <number> | <identifier> | '(' <expression> ')'
\end{grammar}

\begin{grammar}
    <expression> ::=
    \begin{syntdiag} % for expression
        \begin{stack} \\
            '+' \\
            '-'
        \end{stack}
        \begin{rep}
            <term> \\
            \begin{stack} 
                '+' \\
                '-'
            \end{stack}
        \end{rep}
    \end{syntdiag}

    <term> ::=
    \begin{syntdiag} % for expression
        \begin{rep}
            <factor> \\
            \begin{stack} 
                '$\times$' \\
                '/'
            \end{stack}
        \end{rep}
    \end{syntdiag}

    <factor> ::=
    \begin{syntdiag} % for expression
        \begin{stack} 
            <number> \\
            <identifier> \\
            '(' <expression> ')'
        \end{stack}
    \end{syntdiag}
\end{grammar}

% \begin{grammar}
% ...
% \end{grammar}

\end{document}
